author: Beverly Williams "Beverly"

review: Sorry to say that this did not work for our family, it was just not powerful enough to keep the internet signal even after the wireless router was moved into the same room as the Roku. We checked to make sure it was not an internet issue before making our choice and all was fine. The streaming stick just did not have enough power to stay connected to the internet and stream properly. We use it all the time since we do not have cable in the house and it was such a disappointment to us.On a postive note we just LOVE the new layout and added features of the newer Roku!  We are looking into the Roku 3. This issue would not stop us from using any Roku products.
author: DebraP

review: Got as a gift for my Dad, he put it in his spare room where I stayed for my visit. Great price and really fast upload, faster than my bluray player for watching Netflix. Also got to enjoy my Amazon movie library too. If you have more than one TV, this is the way to go, easy setup & install.
